title: Understanding Trichotillomania
text: Trichotillomania is a condition that involves a compulsive urge. Think about what kind of actions might be involved in such a disorder.

title: Characteristics of Trichotillomania
text: Consider what behaviors are typically associated with trichotillomania. It often involves repetitive actions that are difficult to control.

hintAnswer: mental health disorder characterized by a chronic need to pull out one’s hair
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes trichotillomania?
choices: mental disorder in which a person is preoccupied with perceived defects or flaws in their appearance
mental health condition characterized by persistent difficulty discarding or parting with possessions
mental health disorder characterized by a chronic need to pull out one’s hair
